attributes.action: stop the Chancellor creating all these silly taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the introduction of these stealth taxes to stop, it's getting on our nerves! Soon there'll be a tax on how far we're aloud to walk, or how much carbon dioxide we exhale when we breath, perhaps the illegal making of salt water when sweating.....where will it end, or will it?

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several in existence already - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=stealth+taxes+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
